name: Cargo Hill Road 3D Challenge
description:
Cargo Hill Road 3D Challenge is a brand new story game where you can enjoy cargo simulation and crazy stunts on same time. Go on your truck driving. Roads are curly and fuel is short. Enjoy extreme cargo trip with hill truck through off road. Get ready to play a most realistic truck free game.
Features:
- three challenging environments
- Realistic graphics and physics
- three different realistic trucks to drive
- arrows, steering wheel and accelerometer controls
